verses.verse: It shall be, <S%H935><s%> when you have come in to the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H3427><s%> and dwell therein,

that you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the ground, <S%H127><s%> which you shall bring <S%H935><s%> in from your land <S%H776><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you; <S%H7760><s%> and you shall put it in a basket, <S%H2935><s%> and shall go <S%H1980><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose, <S%H977><s%> to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell there. <S%H7931><s%>

You shall come <S%H935><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> who shall be in those days, <S%H3117><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H5046><s%> "I profess this day <S%H3117><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> that I am come <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to our fathers <S%H1><s%> to give us. <S%H5414><s%>"

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the basket <S%H2935><s%> out of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and set it down <S%H3240><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall answer <S%H6030><s%> and say <S%H6030><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> "A Syrian <S%H761><s%> ready to perish <S%H6><s%> was my father; <S%H1><s%> and he went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and lived <S%H1481><s%> there, <S%H4592><s%> few in <S%H4962><s%> number; <S%H1471><s%> and he became there a nation, great, <S%H1419><s%> mighty, <S%H6099><s%> and populous. <S%H7227><s%>
The Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> dealt <S%H7489><s%> ill with us, <S%H6031><s%> and afflicted us, <S%H5414><s%> and laid on us hard <S%H7186><s%> bondage: <S%H5656><s%>

and we cried <S%H6817><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of our fathers, <S%H1><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> our voice, <S%H6963><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> our affliction, <S%H6040><s%> and our toil, <S%H5999><s%> and our oppression; <S%H3906><s%>

and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with great <S%H1419><s%> terror, <S%H4172><s%> and with signs, <S%H226><s%> and with wonders; <S%H4159><s%>

and he has brought <S%H935><s%> us into this place, <S%H4725><s%> and has given <S%H5414><s%> us this land, <S%H776><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

Now, <S%H935><s%> behold, I have brought the first <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit of the ground, <S%H127><s%> which you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have given <S%H5414><s%> me. <S%H3240><s%>" You shall set it down before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in all the good <S%H2896><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> to you, <S%H1004><s%> and to your house, you, <S%H3881><s%> and the Levite, and the foreigner <S%H1616><s%> who is in the midst of you. <S%H7130><s%>

When you have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of tithing <S%H6237><s%> all the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of your increase <S%H8393><s%> in the third <S%H7992><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> which is the year <S%H8141><s%> of tithing, <S%H4643><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> it to the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> to the foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> to the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and to the widow, <S%H490><s%> that they may eat <S%H398><s%> within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> and be filled. <S%H7646><s%>

You shall say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> "I have put away <S%H1197><s%> the holy things <S%H6944><s%> out of my house, <S%H1004><s%> and also have given <S%H5414><s%> them to the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> and to the foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> to the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and to the widow, <S%H490><s%> according to all your commandment <S%H4687><s%> which you have commanded <S%H6680><s%> me: <S%H5674><s%> I have not transgressed any of your commandments, <S%H4687><s%> neither have I forgotten them: <S%H7911><s%>

I have not eaten <S%H398><s%> of it in my mourning, <S%H205><s%> neither have I put away <S%H1197><s%> of it, <S%H2931><s%> being unclean, nor given <S%H5414><s%> of it for the dead: <S%H4191><s%> I have listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God; <S%H430><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> according to all that you have commanded me. <S%H6680><s%>

Look down <S%H8259><s%> from your holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation, <S%H4583><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the ground <S%H127><s%> which you have given <S%H5414><s%> us, <S%H7650><s%> as you swore to our fathers, <S%H1><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>"

This day <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commands <S%H6680><s%> you to do <S%H6213><s%> these statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances: <S%H4941><s%> you shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them with all your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

You have declared <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to be your God, <S%H430><s%> and that you would walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and his ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and listen <S%H8085><s%> to his voice: <S%H6963><s%>

and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has declared <S%H559><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> to be a people <S%H5971><s%> for his own possession, <S%H5459><s%> as he has promised <S%H1696><s%> you, <S%H8104><s%> and that you should keep all his commandments; <S%H4687><s%>

and to make <S%H5414><s%> you high <S%H5945><s%> above all nations <S%H1471><s%> that he has made, <S%H6213><s%> in praise, <S%H8416><s%> and in name, <S%H8034><s%> and in honor; <S%H8597><s%> and that you may be a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as he has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>
